definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)

sentences.english: Fry chopped onion in a heavy-based casserole pot with olive oil.

sentences.english: Pour some oil into a frying pan.
Heat up a frying pan with oil. Stir in slices of ginger, onion, garlic, star anise and peppercorns until aromatic.

sentences.english: Heat up a pan with oil until hot. Fry the marinated chicken until golden.

sentences.english: Food cooked in an electric frying pan is very delicious.

sentences.english: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with cold water.

sentences.english: Place the diced pancetta in a heated pan and stir-fry until they are crispy.

sentences.english: Add in more oil into the frying pan and stir in the shrimps and cook for about half minute. Remove.

sentences.english: To season your wok, put it on the stove over medium-high heat for a few minutes.
